roles.title: Co-founder, Protocol Engineer
roles.description: Solving fragmentation of blockchain networks with an economically secure, low latency interoperability protocol. Built for seamless developer experience across scaling solutions.

roles.title: Smart Contract Engineer
roles.description: Built Gauntlet's 1st on-chain protocol: Aera Finance. Risk aware, capital efficient treasury management solution for DAOs. Audited by Spearbit. Would have prevented the Terra collapse.

roles.title: Partner, Smart Contracts Lead
roles.description: Code owner on production contracts for stablecoin and phone number ownership protocols. Orchestrated DAO governance with security oriented contract release process leveraging OpenZeppelin audits and Certora formal verification.

roles.title: Contractor, Protocol Engineering
roles.description: Built first production implementation of Coinbase Rosetta, an abstraction used for exchange accounting, low level tracing of value transfer, and high security offline staking services for Coinbase Custody customers.

roles.title: Intern, Protocol Engineering
roles.description: Implemented Proof of Stake validator features and slashing conditions, optimized oracle exchange rate reporting for stablecoin protocol, and contributed to privacy preserving enhancements to proof of phone number ownership protocol.

roles.title: Faculty Instructor
roles.description: Taught full-credit course (2x) in the CoFES Institute alongside Professor Manolo Sanchez and Topl founder / CTO James Aman.

roles.title: Rice Blockchain President
roles.description: Founded student organization focused on blockchain education, research, development and evangelism. Led 50+ members in maintaining a newsletter, organizing workshops, and meeting with industry professionals. Repeat host of Houston Ethereum Meetup.

roles.title: Intern, Blockchain Garage
roles.description: Developed the IBM Blockchain Starter Kit: an open-source bootstrap tool for applications on Hyperledger. Includes build, test, deploy framework for goLang and NodeJS. Shipped a CLI for vastly improved developer experience.

roles.title: Intern
roles.description: Built the first Token Curated Registry for the adChain registry, a whitelist of trusted advertisers for consumption by token holding web publishers. Shipped a generic ERC20 voting standard with partial locking and commit reveal scheme.

roles.title: Intern
roles.description: Worked on early smart contract prototypes like Proof of Physical Address: an automated protocol for verifying mailing address ownership with secrets sent via snail mail.

roles.title: Robotics Programming & Electronics Lead
roles.description: Lead highly selective and competitive FRC team. Established freshmen Java, SolidWorks, and Eagle CAD bootcamps. Implemented PID fine motor controls and computer vision techniques

roles.title: Student
roles.description: Honor Roll and National Honors Society member. Alumni include eight Nobel laureates and six Pulitzer authors. Personal favorites are Leslie Lamport and Martin Hellman.
